metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0842 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: xml2js version 0.4.23 allows an external attacker to edit or add new properties to an object. This is possible because the application does not properly validate incoming JSON keys, thus allowing the __proto__ property to be edited.

criterions.comment: node-xml2js package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
